diagnostic.action: Archive to public/_archive/ for lean production footprint; retain for engineering reference only

backup_or_redundant.action: Verify no routing dependency then archive; remove corrupted variants after one sprint of no regressions

emergency.action: Keep archived but accessible for 2 release cycles; then prune

core_keep.action: Retain; candidates for inline script externalization to reduce CSP unsafe-inline

deferred_review.action: Evaluate if portions should be merged into unified preflight; keep until new consolidated testing harness built

nextSteps: Create /public/_archive directory and move listed pages (non-core) there
Run smoke & preflight after move: npm run smoke:test && node scripts/preflight.js
Refactor largest inline blocks from core_keep pages into external modules
Remove unsafe-inline from CSP after externalization
Delete corrupted/legacy pages after two successful deploys with no fallback usage
riskControls: One Git commit per move group (diagnostic, backup)
Abort on any new 404 during preflight
Keep emergency pages until stable flag + auth metrics for two cycles
Do not alter service worker scope during archive moves
